ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: MSH.1 (Field Separator) SHALL contain the constant value '|'.
MSH.2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL contain the constant value '^~\&' or the constant value '^~\&#'.
MSH.9 (Message Type) SHALL contain the constant value 'ORU^R01^ORU_R01'.
MSH.12.1 (Version ID) SHALL contain the constant value '2.5.1'.

Field.Name: Accept Acknowledgment Type
Field.ImpNote: Length 1..15

Field.Name: Application Acknowledgment Type
Field.ImpNote: Length 1..15

Field.Name: Country Code
Field.ImpNote: Max length actually varies depending on the max length of a code in the code set

Field.Name: Character Set
Field.ImpNote: Max length actually varies depending on the max length of a code in the code set

Field.Name: Alternate Character Set Handling Scheme
Field.ImpNote: Max length actually varies depending on the max length of a code in the code set

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.AA' (LRI_GU_FRU_Profile) or three occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.16 (LRI_Common_Component), '2.16.840.1.113883.9.12' (LRI_GU_Component) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.83' (LAB_FRU_Component) in any order.

Assertion.Description: Failed Assertion: No detailed assertion information is available

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.21' (GU_Acknowledgment_Profile) when acknowledging ORU GU Profiles where MSH-21 contains '2.16.840.1.113883.9.AA' (LRI_GU_FRU_Profile), or '2.16.840.1.113883.9.BB' (LRI_GU_FRN_Profile), or '2.16.840.1.113883.9.12' (LRI_GU_Component).
MSH.1 (Field Separator) SHALL contain the constant value '|'.
MSH.2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL contain the constant value '^~\&' or the constant value '^~\&#'.
MSH.9 (Message Type) SHALL contain the constant value 'ACK^R01^ACK'.
MSH.12.1 (Version ID) SHALL contain the constant value '2.5.1'.

Field.Name: Order Status
Field.ImpNote: Max length actually varies depending on the max length of a code in the code set

Field.Name: Response Flag
Field.ImpNote: Max length actually varies depending on the max length of a code in the code set

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: The value of ORC.12 (Ordering Provider) SHALL be identical to the value of OBR.16 (Ordering Provider).
[NOT YET IMPLEMENTED] The value of ORC-31 (Parent Universal Service Identifier) SHALL be identical to the value of OBR-50 (Parent Universal Service Identifier).
[NOT YET IMPLEMENTED] For linking Parent/Child results OBR-26.1 (Parent Observation Identifier) of a child observation SHALL be valued with the parent OBX-3 (Observation Identifier).
[NOT YET IMPLEMENTED] For linking Parent/Child results OBR-26.2 (Parent Observation Sub-identifier) of a child observation SHALL be valued with the parent OBX-4 (Observation Sub-ID).
[NOT YET IMPLEMENTED] For linking Parent/Child results OBR-29.1 (Placer Assigned Identifier) in a child observation SHALL be valued with the parent OBR-2 (Placer Order Number).
[NOT YET IMPLEMENTED] For linking Parent/Child results OBR-29.2 (Filler Assigned Identifier) in a child observation SHALL be valued with the parent OBR-3 (Filler Order Number).

Field.Name: Set ID - OBR

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: The value of OBR.1 (Set ID - OBR) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value '1' within a given segment group.

Field.ImpNote: Length 1..4

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: The value of OBR.2 (Placer Order Number) SHALL be identical to the value of ORC.2 (Placer Order Number).
The value of OBR.3 (Filler Order Number) SHALL be identical to the value of ORC.3 (Filler Order Number).

Field.Name: Priority - OBR
Field.ImpNote: Max length actually varies depending on the max length of a code in the code set

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If present, OBR-8 (Observation End Date/Time) SHALL be equal or later than OBR-7 (Observation Date/Time).

Field.Name: Specimen Action Code

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If valued, OBR.11 (Specimen Action Code) SHALL be a value with A, G, L, or O.

Field.ImpNote: Length 1..15

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: The value of OBR.16 (Ordering Provider) SHALL be identical to the value of ORC.12 (Ordering Provider).

Field.Name: Diagnostic Serv Sect ID
Field.ImpNote: Max length actually varies depending on the max length of a code in the code set

Field.Name: Result Status
Field.ImpNote: Length 1..15

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If OBR.11 (Specimen Action Code) is valued G
If CWE_CRE.1 (Identifier) or CWE_CRE.4 (Alternate Identifier) of at least one occurrence of OBR-49 is valued CC or BCC
If OBR.11 (Specimen Action Code) is valued G

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: [NOT YET IMPLEMENTED] For linking Parent/Child results OBR-26.1 (Parent Observation Identifier) of a child observation SHALL be valued with the parent OBX-3 (Observation Identifier).
[NOT YET IMPLEMENTED] For linking Parent/Child results OBR-26.2 (Parent Observation Sub-identifier) of a child observation SHALL be valued with the parent OBX-4 (Observation Sub-ID).
[NOT YET IMPLEMENTED] For linking Parent/Child results OBR-29.1 (Placer Assigned Identifier) in a child observation SHALL be valued with the parent OBR-2 (Placer Order Number).
[NOT YET IMPLEMENTED] For linking Parent/Child results OBR-29.2 (Filler Assigned Identifier) in a child observation SHALL be valued with the parent OBR-3 (Filler Order Number).

Field.Name: Set ID - OBR

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: The value of OBR.1 (Set ID - OBR) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value '1' within a given segment group.

Field.ImpNote: Length 1..4

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: The value of OBR.2 (Placer Order Number) SHALL be identical to the value of ORC.2 (Placer Order Number).
[NOT YET IMPLEMENTED] The value of OBR-2 (Placer Order Number) SHALL NOT be valued identical to another instance of OBR-2 (Placer Order Number) in the message.
The value of OBR.3 (Filler Order Number) SHALL be identical to the value of ORC.3 (Filler Order Number).
[NOT YET IMPLEMENTED] The value of OBR-3 (Filler Order Number) SHALL NOT be valued identical to another instance of OBR-3 (Filler Order Number) in the message.

Field.Name: Priority - OBR
Field.ImpNote: Max length actually varies depending on the max length of a code in the code set

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If present, OBR-8 (Observation End Date/Time) SHALL be equal or later than OBR-7 (Observation Date/Time).

Field.Name: Specimen Action Code

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If valued, OBR.11 (Specimen Action Code) SHALL be a value with A, G, L, or O.

Field.ImpNote: Length 1..15

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: The value of OBR.16 (Ordering Provider) SHALL be identical to the value of ORC.12 (Ordering Provider).

Field.Name: Cyclic Group Maximum Number of Repeats

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: [NOT YET IMPLEMENTED] If OBX-2 (Value Type) is valued, then the data type format for OBX-5 (Observation Value) SHALL conform to the corresponding constrained data type identified in the "Data Type Flavor" column of Table 4‑7. HL7 Table 0125 – Value Type (V2.5.1) in this guide.

If there are multiple OBX segments associated with the same OBR segment that have the same OBX-3 values for (OBX-3.1 + OBX-3.3) or (OBX-3.4 + OBX-3.6), a combination of (OBX-3.1 + OBX3.3) or (OBX-3.4 + OBX-3.6) and OBX-4 SHALL create a unique identification under a single OBR.

Field.Name: Set ID - OBX

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: The value of OBX.1 (Set ID - OBX) SHALL be valued sequentially starting the value '1'.

Field.ImpNote: Length 1..4

Field.Name: Value Type

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If OBX.5 (Observation Value) is valued

Field.ImpNote: Length 1..15

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If there are multiple OBX segments associated with the same OBR segment that have the same OBX-3 values for (OBX-3.1 and OBX-3.3) or (OBX-3.4 and OBX-3.6).

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If OBX.5 (Observation Value) is CE (as indicated in OBX.2), then CE.1 (Identifier) and CE.3 (Name of Coding System) or CE. 4 (Alternate Identifier) and CE.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) SHALL be valued.
The value of OBX-5 (Observation Value) SHALL NOT be truncated.
If CWE.3/CWE.6 is valued 'LN' then CWE.1/CWE.4 SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
If CE.3/CE.6 is valued 'LN' then CE.1/CE.4 SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If OBX-2 (Value Type) is valued "NM" or "SN" and OBX-11 is not valued "X" or "N"
